description: nine black tiles with aqua green design of mermaid, smaller figure and fish
text: One of the earliest pieces by the Scheiers in the collection of John B. Davis, this mural, acquired directly from the Scheiers, is a rare example of their work with glazed tiles.  A charming mermaid-and-man theme is complemented by the matte glaze in aquatic colors.
title: Mermaid with Man and Fish
